name: Hungry for Ammo
description:
Shoot enemies! Devour them for ammo! Toss your old cartridge out and watch it explode!

--------------------------------
Controls:
Arrow Keys to Move
Z to Jump, X to Shoot
A and S to Equip different Cartridges
F to go Fullscreen, Enter to Pause

- Run into enemies to eat them and get ammo
- Shoot with no ammo to toss you Cartridge
- Tossing a Cart will have different effects depending on which is equiped
--------------------------------
This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam, with the theme of "Dual Purpose Design"
The game utilizes this theme in these ways:
- Movement also serves as an attack (Eating enemies), which also replenishes ammo
- The usage of your gun and the ability to throw your cartridge are both tied to your number of bullets
--------------------------------
I. Doctor Dool, am the sole creator of this game. All in-game assets were made by me.

Game made with Clickteam Fusion 2.5
Sounds made with Bfxr
Music made with LMMS
i took some notes in notepad too
